name: ogrep-marketplace
description: Claude Code marketplace for ogrep - semantic code search with multiple modes: semantic (conceptual), fulltext (FTS5), and hybrid. Supports local models via LM Studio (offline, free) or OpenAI embeddings.

plugins.name: ogrep
plugins.description: Semantic code search with multiple modes: semantic (embedding similarity for conceptual queries), fulltext (FTS5 keyword matching for exact identifiers), and hybrid (combined - best of both). JSON output for AI tools.
